QuestData.Title: Twisted Associations
QuestData.Description: The Legion and Kael'thas' forces are becoming increasingly intertwined. This concerns me very deeply.$B$BFrom what we can gather Selin Fireheart and Priestess Delrissa work closely together to unite the two armies. You need to stop them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Exarch Larethor in the Magisters' Terrace wants you to kill Selin Fireheart and Priestess Delrissa.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, soldier. One step at a time.
